titleStmt.title: St Pauls challenge, or The Churches triumph: in a sermon, preacht at the Fort-Royal March 3. 1643. By Jer: Leech. And now published at the request both of the generous; and his much honored friend captaine George Dipfort.
titleStmt.author: Leech, Jeremiah.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Paine, and are to be sold by Francis Eglesfield at the Marigold in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
